## About this Project

This project explores the probable mean margin of victory (points differential) in NFL regular season games from 1978 through 2013. The point spread (betting line) are highlighted in 4 plots to highlight the probable distribution of the mean margin of victory. 

[Click here to access project GitHub repository](https://github.com/nicholasgrant97/nfl-inside-the-spread).
